2 new CVS drive-thru testing sites open today



Today, 2 more CVS drive-thru testing sites cor COVID-19 will open in the valley. The first location is near Maryland Parkway and Sahara. The second is near Green Valley Parkway and Sunset. Credit: KTNV Channel 13 Las Vegas Duration: 00:15 Published 5 hours ago

2 new CVS drive-thru testing sites to open tomorrow



Two more CVS drive-thru testing sites will open tomorrow in the East Valley. You must register in advance at CVS.com to get tested. Credit: KTNV Channel 13 Las Vegas Duration: 00:23 Published 1 day ago
